title: 'Game of Thrones' Returns and Disney Unveils a New 'Star Wars' Resort (Ep. 168)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss and review the Season 7 premiere of ‘Game of Thrones’ (5:00). Later, they discuss the unveiling of Disney’s new Star Wars–themed resort, Galaxy’s Edge and Marvel Avengers news (32:00), before circling back to Season 2 of ‘Master of None’ (46:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
